Sure, the answer is "John Dalton's studies".

John Dalton was a British chemist and physicist who lived between 1766 and 1844. He is considered one of the greatest scientists of all time, and is best known for his contributions to the development of the theory of atoms. He also conducted many experiments on the properties of gases, and developed the concept of the atom.
